item.description: The All Star Dynomite Disco Review is the East Coast's hottest and most authentic "Flashback to the 70's band". The six-piece group combines great dance music from the disco/funk era with a fun, interactive stage show that appeals to people of all ages. The Disco Reiview will turn any event into an exciting and memorable experience perrorming hits by Donna Summer, K.C. & The Sunshine Band, The Bee Gees, The Village People, Earth, Wind & Fire, Gloria Gaynor & more. This group is very popular and has shared the stage with The Village People, The Trammps, Thelma Houston, Bonnie Pointer, The First Ladies of Chic, Deney Terrio, Carol Williams, Peter Noone and Herman's Hermits, and K.C. and the Sunshine Band. I don't think I have ever gotten over disco fever. Have you?
item.name: Dynomite Disco Review
